#summary supported phylogenetic tree formats

== supported input formats ==
  * [http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Newick_format newick/ phylip]
  * [http://phylosoft.org/NHX/ nhx]
  * [http://www.bioperl.org/wiki/NEXUS_multiple_alignment_format#Tree nexus]
  * [http://www.phyloxml.org/ phyloXML] (partial; embedded annotations will not be parsed by EvolView for now)

== supported output formats (text files) ==
  * [http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Newick_format newick]
  * [http://phylosoft.org/NHX/ nhx]
  * [http://www.bioperl.org/wiki/NEXUS_multiple_alignment_format#Tree nexus]
  * [http://www.phyloxml.org/ phyloXML]


== supported output formats (graphical files) ==
  * pdf
  * svg
  * png
  * jpeg / jpg
  * tiff / tif
